plagiarism.warning: Confirmation/Denial of a plagiarism will be lost when refreshing the page.
plagiarism.similarity-threshold-tooltip: Ignore comparisons whose similarity is below this threshold (%)
plagiarism.minimum-score-tooltip: Consider only submissions whose score is greater or equal to this value
plagiarism.minimum-size-tooltip: Consider only submissions whose size is greater or equal to this value
plagiarism.minimum-size-tooltip-modeling: Consider only submissions that have at least as many modeling elements as the specified value
plagiarism.minimum-size-tooltip-text: Consider only submissions that have at least as many characters as the specified value
plagiarism.caution: Plagiarism detection can take a long time for large courses.
